mods.abstract: Typed invoice for an order placed by Jim McConnell of the Nashville City Club for 1 jumbo (half sheet) and 200 cards. Receipt indicates agreed price, size, order quantity, shipping location and description for posters featuring the a celebration at the Nashville City Club. To view the poster for this order see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/32387.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
